I was over at http://www.hajimenokizu.com
.wait. you've never BEEN TO HNK? =
 well go and check it out 
The charm of doujinshi is the many renditions of=
 your favorite
characters from all different "universes"

so I was thinking=
...
what if fans made up their own doujinshi?---maybe not an ENTIRE
doujins=
hi but just the cover...

THE FOURTH NAME
covers the bio of Saitou between =
the time he dropped the name
Yamaguchi Jiro to when he starts using Fujita =
Goro
the fourth name is ***Ichinohe Denpachi so the story is post Aizu
defe=
at to when he gets married and uses the name Fujita

just to make this a do=
ujinshi for women ofcourse there will be YASO
and Tokio....you know to make=
 things "interesting" (look if Japanese
artists can pair up Saitou with Hik=
o then I can do anything)

please use your imagination pretend it is all co=
lorful and glossy and
real professional
I dislike facial hair on guys---but=
 since this is Saitou as a prisoner
of war in perpetual kinshin---then he's=
 got to have a beard 
warning: Saitou is a "pretty boy" (^_^)
http://1happy=
turtle.com/temporary/4thname.jpg

note:  I was reading some posts in Japane=
se Aizu fandom and finally
someone came up with a wacky idea "Takagi Goro/M=
orinusuke as Byakkotai
Ninja"

*Takagi MOrinusuke was Tokio's younger broth=
er (age 14/15 in 1868 so
technically he was a bit too young to be in the By=
akkotai)
he was just a messenger and scout during the siege...but he -can- =
be a
ninja in camouflage---I drew him in the top box
